vulnerabilities.description: Origin advertises HTTP/2 (h2) via ALPN; ensure HTTP/2-specific hardening (HPACK/DoS controls, reverse-proxy config).
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Review HTTP/2 configuration at the edge (WAF/CDN/proxy), apply rate limits, and keep TLS stack updated.

vulnerabilities.description: Cookie is scoped to a parent domain, which can expand the attack surface across subdomains.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Prefer host-only cookies (omit Domain) for session/auth cookies; isolate auth to dedicated subdomains.
